kickstart.description: bamtools - https://github.com/pezmaster31/bamtools biopython - http://biopython.org bismark - http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/bismark blast - http://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi blat - http://genome.ucsc.edu bowtie - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net bowtie2 - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2 bsseeker - http://pellegrini.mcdb.ucla.edu/BS_Seeker/ bwa - http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net Cufflinks - http://cufflinks.cbcb.umd.edu fastqc - http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc fastx - http://hannonlab.cshl.edu/fastx_toolkit GenomeAnalysisTK - http://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk gmap-gsnap (Genomic Mapping and Alignment Program,Genomic Short-read Nucleotide Alignment Program - http://research-pub.gene.com/gmap/ htseq - https://pypi.python.org/pypi/HTSeq picard - http://picard.sourceforge.net/ plink - http://pngu.mgh.harvard.edu/~purcell/plink rnastar - https://code.google.com/p/rna-star samtools - http://samtools.sourceforge.net soapdenovo - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html SOAPsnp - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapsnp.html spades - http://bioinf.spbau.ru/en/spades Tophat - http://tophat.cbcb.umd.edu trimmomatic - http://www.usadellab.org/cms/?page=trimmomatic trinity (Inchworm, Chrysalis,Butterfly) - http://trinityrnaseq.sourceforge.net velvet - http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~zerbino/velvet
